function amz_js_PopWin(url,name,options){
  var ContextWindow = window.open(url,name,options);
  ContextWindow.focus();
  return false;
}
//--&gt;
  </script>

  i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   n   o   d   e   =   4   8   4   5   9   7   5   0   3   1   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a       n   a   v   -   h   a   s   A   r   r   o   w   "       d   a   t   a   -   e   v   e   n   t   =   "   c   e   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   6   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   a   n   d   l   e   r   =   "   g   e   n   e   r   i   c   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   f   u   l   l   -   w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   "       d   a   t   a   -   n   a   v   -   k   e   y   =   "   a   b   :   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   6   ,   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   p   r   o   m   o   -   6   :   g   e   n   e   r   i   c   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   s   l   o   t   s   =   "   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   6   ,   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   p   r   o   m   o   -   6   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   "   &gt;   W   e   a   r   a   b   l   e       T   e   c   h   n   o   l   o   g   y   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   r   r   o   w   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   a   &gt;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   E   l   e   c   t   r   o   n   i   c   s   -   A   c   c   e   s   s   o   r   i   e   s   /   b   /   r   e   f   =   s   v   _   c   e   _   8   /   2   7   5   -   6   2   1   7   7   0   5   -   7   3   6   2   4   6   7   ?   i   e   =   U   T   F   8   &amp;a   m   p   ;   n   o   d   e   =   1   3   4   5   7   4   1   0   3   1   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a       n   a   v   -   h   a   s   A   r   r   o   w   "       d   a   t   a   -   e   v   e   n   t   =   "   c   e   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   7   "       d   a   t   a   -   h   a   n   d   l   e   r   =   "   g   e   n   e   r   i   c   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   f   u   l   l   -   w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   "       d   a   t   a   -   n   a   v   -   k   e   y   =   "   a   b   :   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   7   ,   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   p   r   o   m   o   -   7   :   g   e   n   e   r   i   c   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   "       d   a   t   a   -   s   l   o   t   s   =   "   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   7   ,   c   e   -   s   u   b   n   a   v   -   f   l   y   o   u   t   -   p   r   o   m   o   -   7   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   -   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   "   &gt;   A   c   c   e   s   s   o   r   i   e   s   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   a   v   -   a   r   r   o   w   "   &gt;   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   a   &gt;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   /   C   a   r   -   E   l   e   c   t   r   o   n   i   c   s   /   b   /   r   e   f   =   s   v   _   c   e   _   9   /   2   7   5   -   6   2   1   7   7   0   5   -   7   3   6   2   4   6   7   ?    w   i   n   d   o   w   .   $   N   a   v       &amp;&amp;    $   N   a   v   .   d   e   c   l   a   r   e   (   '   c   o   n   f   i   g   .   e   n   a   b   l   e   B   b   P   r   e   f   e   t   c   h   '   ,       f   a   l   s   e   )   ;

                   v   a   r       s   c   r   e   e   n   H   e   i   g   h   t       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   .   h   e   i   g   h   t   (   )   ;   
                   v   a   r       s   c   r   e   e   n   T   o   p       =       j   Q   u   e   r   y   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   .   s   c   r   o   l   l   T   o   p   (   )   ;   
                   r   e   t   u   r   n       (   s   c   r   e   e   n   H   e   i   g   h   t   +   s   c   r   e   e   n   T   o   p   )       &gt;       c   u   r   T   o   p   ;   
       }   
   }   )   ;       
   
   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;

  r   e   v   i   e   w   s   -   t   o   p   ;   p   i   d   =   B   0   0   H   4   8   H   9   S   C   ;   a   s   i   n   =   B   0   0   H   4   8   H   9   S   C   ;   b   n   =   5   6   0   7   9   8   ;   p   r   i   d   =   1   T   K   M   V   0   Z   R   Z   V   0   0   H   M   F   5   Q   8   R   R   ;   a   r   i   d   =   e   8   0   c   a   6   1   9   a   d   c   9   4   c   8   2   a   5   0   d   0   0   5   e   7   9   7   3   2   6   0   6   ;   a   d   -   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   t   y   p   e       =       "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   ;   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   .   a   s   y   n   c       =       t   r   u   e   ;   (   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   h   e   a   d   '   )   [   0   ]   |   |   d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   .   g   e   t   E   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   B   y   T   a   g   N   a   m   e   (   '   b   o   d   y   '   )   [   0   ]   )   .   a   p   p   e   n   d   C   h   i   l   d   (   s   f   L   i   b   r   a   r   y   )   ;   }   }       c   a   t   c   h   (   e   x   )       {   i   f   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   )       {   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   u   e   L   o   g   E   r   r   o   r   (   e   x   ,       {   l   o   g   L   e   v   e   l       :       '   E   R   R   O   R   '   ,   a   t   t   r   i   b   u   t   i   o   n       :       '   D   A   C   X   -   s   a   f   e   f   r   a   m   e   '   ,   m   e   s   s   a   g   e       :       '   E   r   r   o   r       a   p   p   e   n   d   i   n   g       D   A   s   f       l   i   b   r   a   r   y   '   }   )   ;   }   }   ;   }   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   ,       d   o   c   u   m   e   n   t   )   )   ;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   /   d   i   v   &gt;   
                           d   i   v   &gt;

                           }   
                           v   a   r       l   a   s   t   C   h   e   c   k   D   i   f   f       =       n   e   w       D   a   t   e   (   )   .   g   e   t   T   i   m   e   (   )       -       l   a   s   t   C   h   e   c   k   ;   
                           v   a   r       c   h   e   c   k   D   e   l   a   y       =       (   l   a   s   t   C   h   e   c   k   D   i   f   f           2   0   0       ?       2   0   0       -       l   a   s   t   C   h   e   c   k   D   i   f   f       :       1   0   )   ;

                           v   a   r       u       =       f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   )       {   
                                   i   f   (   s   h   v   l   P   r   e   s   e   n   t       &amp;&amp;    (   w   i   n   .   s   c   r   o   l   l   T   o   p   (   )       +       w   i   n   .   h   e   i   g   h   t   (   )       &gt;       f   e   a   t   u   r   e   .   o   f   f   s   e   t   (   )   .   t   o   p       +       2   0   0   )   )       {

                                                   v   a   r       i   m   g   E   l   e   m   s       =       $   (   s   e   l   e   c   t   o   r   )   .   f   i   n   d   (   "   a       &gt;       d   i   v       &gt;       i   m   g   "   )   ;

                                                   p   (   i   m   g   s   ,   p   g   s   )   ;

                   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   a   m   z   n   J   Q       &amp;&amp;    a   m   z   n   J   Q   .   d   e   c   l   a   r   e   A   v   a   i   l   a   b   l   e   (   '   n   a   v   b   a   r   B   T   F   '   )   ;   
                   (   w   i   n   d   o   w   .   A   m   a   z   o   n   U   I   P   a   g   e   J   S       ?       A   m   a   z   o   n   U   I   P   a   g   e   J   S       :       P   )   .   r   e   g   i   s   t   e   r   (   '   n   a   v   C   F   '   )   ;

   d   i   v       i   d   =   "   m   e   r   c   h   a   n   t   -   h   e   l   p   -   l   i   n   k   s   "   &gt;   t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   1   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       b   g   c   o   l   o   r   =   "   #   9   9   9   9   9   9   "   &gt;

   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   c   ,   d   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   c   .   u   e   ,   a   =   d   .   n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   ;   b   &amp;&amp;b   .   t   a   g   &amp;&amp;a   &amp;&amp;(   a   =   a   .   c   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   |   |   a   .   m   o   z   C   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   |   |   a   .   w   e   b   k   i   t   C   o   n   n   e   c   t   i   o   n   )   &amp;&amp;a   .   t   y   p   e   &amp;&amp;b   .   t   a   g   (   "   n   e   t   I   n   f   o   :   "   +   a   .   t   y   p   e   )   }   )   (   u   e   _   c   s   m   ,   w   i   n   d   o   w   )   ;

   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "   &gt;   
   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   c   ,   d   )   {   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       l   (   a   ,   b   )   {   f   o   r   (   v   a   r       c   =   [   ]   ,   d   =   0   ;   d   a   .   l   e   n   g   t   h   ;   d   +   +   )   {   v   a   r       e   =   a   [   d   ]   ,   f   =   b   .   e   n   c   o   d   e   (   e   )   ;   i   f   (   e   [   h   ]   )   {   v   a   r       g   =   b   .   m   e   t   a   S   e   p   ,   e   =   e   [   h   ]   ,   l   =   b   .   m   e   t   a   P   a   i   r   S   e   p   ,   k   =   [   ]   ,   m   =   v   o   i   d       0   ;   f   o   r   (   m       i   n       e   )   e   .   h   a   s   O   w   n   P   r   o   p   e   r   t   y   (   m   )   &amp;&amp;k   .   p   u   s   h   (   m   +   "   =   "   +   e   [   m   ]   )   ;   e   =   k   .   j   o   i   n   (   l   )   ;   f   +   =   g   +   e   }   c   .   p   u   s   h   (   f   )   }   r   e   t   u   r   n       c   .   j   o   i   n   (   b   .   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   S   e   p   )   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       r   (   a   )   {   v   a   r       b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   s   ]   |   |   (   b   [   s   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   m   i   d   )   ;   b   [   t   ]   |   |   (   b   [   t   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   s   i   d   )   ;   b   [   f   ]   |   |   (   b   [   f   ]   =   c   .   u   e   _   i   d   )   ;   a   =   "   /   /   "   +   c   .   u   e   _   f   u   r   l   +   "   /   1   /   "   +   a   [   u   ]   +   "   /   1   /   O   P   /   "   +   a   [   v   ]   +   "   /   "   +   a   [   w   ]   +   "   /   "   +   l   (   [   a   ]   ,   x   )   ;   i   f   (   k   )   t   r   y   {   k   .   c   a   l   l   (   d   [   n   ]   ,   a   )   }   c   a   t   c   h   (   g   )   {   c   .   u   e   .   s   b   f   =   1   ,   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   a   }   e   l   s   e   (   n   e   w       I   m   a   g   e   )   .   s   r   c   =   
   a   }   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n       p   (   )   {   g   &amp;&amp;g   .   i   s   S   t   u   b   &amp;&amp;g   .   r   e   p   l   a   y   (   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   )   {   a   =   a   [   0   ]   ;   b   =   a   [   h   ]   =   a   [   h   ]   |   |   {   }   ;   b   [   f   ]   =   b   [   f   ]   |   |   c   ;   r   (   a   )   }   )   ;   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   =   r   ;   g   =   n   u   l   l   }   i   f   (   !   (   1   c   .   u   e   i   n   i   t   )   )   {   v   a   r       h   =   "   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   "   ,   w   =   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   "   ,   u   =   "   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   "   ,   v   =   "   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   "   ,   s   =   "   m   a   r   k   e   t   p   l   a   c   e   I   d   "   ,   t   =   "   s   e   s   s   i   o   n   "   ,   f   =   "   r   e   q   u   e   s   t   I   d   "   ,   n   =   "   n   a   v   i   g   a   t   o   r   "   ,   y   =   c   .   u   e   _   b   l   i   ,   k   =   d   [   n   ]   &amp;&amp;d   [   n   ]   .   s   e   n   d   B   e   a   c   o   n   ,   q   =   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   ,   b   ,   c   ,   d   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n   {   e   n   c   o   d   e   :   d   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   S   e   p   :   a   ,   m   e   t   a   S   e   p   :   b   ,   m   e   t   a   P   a   i   r   S   e   p   :   c   }   }   ,   x   =   q   (   "   "   ,   "   ?    A   )   }   )   ,   A   =   q   (   "   ,   "   ,   "   @   "   ,   "   |   "   ,   f   u   n   c   t   i   o   n   (   a   )   {   r   e   t   u   r   n       a   .   i   d   }   )   ,   g   =   c   .   u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   ;   y   &amp;&amp;u   e   .   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   (   {   p   r   o   g   r   a   m   G   r   o   u   p   :   "   c   s   m   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   T   y   p   e   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   "   ,   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   D   a   t   a   :   [   {   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   N   a   m   e   :   "   c   s   m   -   f   e   a   t   u   r   e   s   "   ,   r   e   s   o   u   r   c   e   s   :   [   {   i   d   :   "   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   -   t   r   a   c   k   i   n   g   "   }   ]   }   ]   ,   m   e   t   a   d   a   t   a   :   {   c   s   m   :   1   }   ,   f   o   r   e   s   t   e   r   C   h   a   n   n   e   l   :   "   a   c   t   i   o   n   -   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   i   o   n   s   "   }   )   ;   k   ?   p   (   )   :   (   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   ,   u   e   .   a   t   t   a   c   h   (   "   b   e   f   o   r   e   u   n   l   o   a   d   "   ,   p   )   )   ;   d   .   P   &amp;&amp;d   .   P   .   r   e   g   i   s   t   e   r   &amp;&amp;d   .    /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;   
   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;
